title: MSC steams ahead of Maersk after massive capacity increase in 2025
summary:
For the fifth year in a row, of the 12 largest container lines, 2025 saw MSC adding the most capacity, stretching its lead over second-placed Maersk to 2.5m teu.
According to new research from Alphaliner, the Aponte family-controlled carrier added 831,400 teu of capacity to its fleet, a year-on-year increase of 11.7%.

title: DHL Supply Chain to manage Waitrose’s newest distribution center
summary:
DHL Supply Chain has announced it will operate food retailer Waitrose’s new regional distribution center at the Mountpark Bristol 360 development.

The 360,000ft2 (33,445m2) site, which is the retailer’s first in the UK southwest, will open in early 2027, creating 550 new jobs, including 480 warehouse roles and more than 80 driver positions.

DHL will manage warehousing and transportation operations and will support deliveries to around 50 existing Waitrose shops, with the flexibility to serve additional stores as the retailer expands across the southwest.

Continue reading DHL Supply Chain to manage Waitrose’s newest distribution center at Parcel and Postal Technology International.
